description:
Talk about a Big Bang for your buck! Three months after listing his Los Feliz mansion for sale, Robert Pattinson has sold the home he once shared with ex-girlfriend Kristen Stewart to none other than Big Bang Theory star Jim Parsons, real estate Trulia reports.我们来看看《生活大爆炸》的土豪！罗伯特·帕丁森之前想把和前女友克里斯汀·斯图尔特曾经住过的爱巢卖掉，这栋洛斯费利兹区的豪宅在挂牌3个月后终于被《生活大爆炸》男星Jim Parsons买下。

The Twilight actor first put the L.A.-area house on the market for $6.75 million in October, Trulia notes. Parsons purchased it on Jan. 14 for $6.375 million, according to property records; it was also once owned by basketball legend Kareem-Abdul Jabbar.去年十月，这位《暮光之城》男星的物业原始开价是674万美元，而Parsons最后以637.5万美元购入。这里也曾经是篮球传奇人物Kareem-Abdul Jabbar的住处。

Built on a terraced 1.5 acre lot in the hills above L.A., the 1922 Spanish Colonial-style estate has three bedrooms, three-and-a-half bathrooms, and a library/study, all spread out over 4,026 square feet. Outside, there's a lagoon-style swimming pool -- not to mention gorgeous gardens and a view of the city.这栋占地1.5亩的豪宅位于洛杉矶的一座山上，有着典型的1922年西班牙殖民时期风格，拥有3个半坊间，一个书房，总占地面积4026平方英尺。房子外面还有一个环礁湖风格的游泳池——当然还有很好的花园而且还能俯瞰全城。
